nodes.text: Marc Hagan-Guirey, also known as Paper Dandy, is a design director, author and paper artist specializing in the craft of kirigami; a variation of origami that includes cutting of the paper.
His Star Wars Kirigami book was published by Chronicle Books on September 1, 2017. It came out in the series of Journey to Star Wars: The Last Jedi.
Marc has published 4 other books; Horrorgami (2015) and Frank Lloyd Wright Paper Models (2017), Le Corbusier Paper Models (2019) and A Pop-Up Experience Star Wars Cockpits (2020).
